Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and one area of cream-coloured paint and remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393813) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393813)
